sources.name: StageSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'currentfilename',
	wildcardPaths:['output/DWstaging/*.parquet']) ~> StageSource

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
FilterRows sink(input(
		year as integer,
		ratingByYear as double,
		yearkey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	keys:['yearkey']) ~> sink1

transformations.name: CreateAggs
transformations.script:
StageSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	ratingByYear = round(avg((Rating * 5) + RottenTomato),2)) ~> CreateAggs
